intro-david-catuhe.title: Introducing David Catuhe
intro-david-catuhe.abstract: As a way of introducing our astonishing array of speakers, they have kindly agreed to answer a few questions for us. Here is David Catuhe ('a 3D addict since the prehistoric age of computing'), who will show us how to do awesome 3D with nothing more than a modern browser!

intro-allen-pike.title: Introducing Allen Pike
intro-allen-pike.abstract: Allen Pike runs Steamclock Software in Vancouver. His talk is about the causes and consequences of JavaScriptâ€™s turbulent framework ecosystem.
